item.title: Welcome to Hippo's home
item.author: hippo1993928 at gmail.com (Yu-Chang, Ho (Hippo))
item.description:
This is my personal website built by hugo tool and used "hyde-y" theme.
hyde-y is a blog theme project I discover on Github as the following link: hyde-y

I started this website on June 30, 2016.

I graduated from university this July. Recently, I’m preparing to study aborad.
Since I expect to do a lot of projects in the future and I wish to remember the detail of my works, I will record them all using this website.

Also, since learning has an accumulated nature, after I solved problems, no matter encounterd them from coding or life event, I will record my solution in here.

Thanks for your visiting!
